description:
OS signed binaries used by attackers to evade detection
Powershell writing a file then running a process that is unsigned finally where network event is true.
name: Adversary Emulation - Powershell Writing a File
query:
sequence by host.name
  [process where event.type == "start"
    and process.name in
     ("powershell.exe", "mshta.exe", "installutil.exe", 
      "msxsl.exe", "rundll32.exe")
  ]
[file where file.extension == "exe"]
[process where process.code_signature.status != "trusted" and event.type == "start"]
[network where true]
